response.original_title: Ramon Ontiveros' Scandal: Impersonating Minors + Sending Explicit Images = CSAM Crimes
response.overview: This episode examines public reports that Ramon Ontiveros impersonated minors online and transmitted sexually explicit images of real teenagers, conduct that, under U.S. law, constitutes CSAM regardless of intent.
response.tagline: Ramon Ontiveros' Scandal: Impersonating Minors + Sending Explicit Images = CSAM Crimes
response.title: Ramon Ontiveros' Scandal: Impersonating Minors + Sending Explicit Images = CSAM Crimes
